name: Quavers
description:
It is the beginning of time. The universe exists as one infinitesimally small point. During this fraction of a nanosecond, sound waves have an incredible effect on the nature of reality. Using the power of music, you must help guide a school of quavers to reach their ascension and plant the seeds of intelligent life in the universe.

Made for the 2017 Global Game Jam

parallaxvisions.com
